title: Ranked

embed.description: ShadowKnight928 / Bronze 5 0LP / 6W 4L Win Ratio 60% / Morgana - 2W 2L Win Ratio 50%, Alistar - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%, Diana - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Jax - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Yasuo - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%

body: So i won 6 games and lost 4, in my final game i was versing couple of bronze 3's and 3 or 4 silver 5's we won, i was Morgana my score was 1-1-9 and they surrendered at 20. Somehow i got placed Bronze 5, 0 LP how is that even possible. Is it if you play Support you'll get a worse rank because you get no CS, Towers or Kills?

replies.body: it carries over from last season so you finished bronze 5 last season.... ta ding start at b5 this season.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=urnumMEV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-25T04:04:30.286+0000)
>
> it carries over from last season so you finished bronze 5 last season.... ta ding start at b5 this season.

Adding on, placement rank depends on MMR, and scores/roles aren't valued as much as the base MMR that you had in the previous season.
